mapper.select: SELECT f.FAQ_IDX, f.FAQ_TITLE, fc.FAQ_CATEGORY_NAME FROM FAQ_TABLE f LEFT JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY fc ON f.FAQ_CATEGORY = fc.FAQ_CATEGORY_IDX
SELECT f.FAQ_IDX, f.FAQ_TITLE, fc.FAQ_CATEGORY_NAME FROM FAQ_TABLE f LEFT JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY fc ON f.FAQ_CATEGORY = fc.FAQ_CATEGORY_IDX WHERE f.FAQ_CATEGORY = #{faqCategory}

SELECT F.FAQ_IDX AS faqIdx, F.FAQ_TITLE AS faqTitle, F.FAQ_ANSWER AS faqAnswer, F.FAQ_CATEGORY AS faqCategory, C.FAQ_CATEGORY_NAME AS faqCategoryName FROM FAQ_TABLE F LEFT JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON F.FAQ_CATEGORY = C.FAQ_CATEGORY_IDX WHERE F.FAQ_IDX = #{faqIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ_TABLE (FAQ_IDX, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_CATEGORY) VALUES (Faq_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{faqTitle}, #{faqAnswer}, #{faqCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_IDX, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_CATEGORY FROM FAQ_TABLE WHERE CONTAINS(FAQ_TITLE, #{query}) > 0 OR CONTAINS(FAQ_ANSWER, #{query}) > 0
